name: The Revenge of The Mummy
description:
This game takes you to Egipt, in the pharaoh era. You will control a powerful mummy, and you will have to kill all the enemies in your way to achieve the pleasure of the revenge. You will be able to move in this 2d map using a lot of mechanics to jump over the platforms, such as the dash or the hook. Are you ready?

This game has good points like:

- Great art

- Interesting levels

- A lot of mechanics
